title: Solr NRT (real time search) does not work
description: Real Time search does not work with Solr 1.4.1 or 3.1. Archives point to no solutions and it appears that the problem will not be addressed.

comments.author: Nagendra Nagarajayya
comments.content:
Here is a solution that provides real time search in version 1.4.1:
http://solr-ra.tgels.com/wiki/en/Near_Real_Time_Search
http://solr-ra.tgels.com/papers/NRT_Solr_RankingAlgorithm.pdf

comments.author: Nagendra Nagarajayya
comments.content:
Attached paper describes how NRT (Near Real Time Search) can be implemented in Solr
using the RankingAlgorithm. The technical details of the NRT implementation are
discussed.

comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
comments.content: Nagendra, will you be providing a patch?  If not, a better home for the above links may be on some Solr Wiki page.

comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
comments.content: Actually, I'm closing this because we already have SOLR-2566 for adding NRT support to Solr.
